3Vt9tFjjJmSsJ99w.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 16, standby
3Vt9tFjjJmSsJ99w.name: Wind-Up

UZrxxtljdLoLewB9.description: The pilot engages a lever that activates the clockwork components to transform the adaptable paddleboat's waterwheels into wheels for rolling along the ground. This grants the adaptable paddleboat Speed 20 feet and reduces its swim Speed to 5 feet. This transformation lasts until the pilot disengages the wheels by using this activity again.
UZrxxtljdLoLewB9.name: Deploy Wheels

zGMODH6r1X3ZbwB1.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
zGMODH6r1X3ZbwB1.name: Sluggish

DoCusD26UNQbmFNI.description: This vehicle travels on a continuous band of heavy treads driven by a series of gears and wheels, enabling it to travel over rugged land with ease. Earth, rock, rubble, slopes, and underbrush are not difficult terrain to an ambling surveyor. The ambling surveyor ignores difficult terrain from earth, rock, rubble, slopes, and underbrush, and greater difficult terrain caused by those features is normal difficult terrain to the ambling surveyor.
DoCusD26UNQbmFNI.name: Continous Track

R4Co971n6x5ZNJHd.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 32, standby
R4Co971n6x5ZNJHd.name: Wind-Up

Yr2rxvC8Hzmb70KZ.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
Yr2rxvC8Hzmb70KZ.name: Sluggish

eXdF4IskaccqgTpS.description:
Requirements The ambling surveyor is not in motion

Effect The pilot and crew release a collection of six clockwork birds, which spend two hours flying over the surrounding area within a 1-mile radius around the ambling surveyor. Everything the birds see is magically transmitted back to the ambling surveyor's crew as illusory images, which the crew must catalogue in real-time if they want to use the information to fully survey the area and create a map. After two hours, the birds return. The birds use the base statistics of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary-3.Actor.cKZtOsBlN3Qu8Kyq]{Clockwork Spy} if they are attacked, or if their Perception is important to determine what they can see, although they only perform the Survey action and they don't have any of the other abilities of a clockwork spy. Replacement birds cost 250 gp each.
eXdF4IskaccqgTpS.name: Survey

KFSpJiu6uoHoZl1b.description: A crew member operates a lever set up like a joystick, allowing that crew member to extend and manipulate the apparatus's hands. While the hands can't attack and can't perform fine actions such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable Device}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{Steal} something, or opening the stopper on a potion bottle, but they can grasp and hold up to 50 Bulk.
KFSpJiu6uoHoZl1b.name: Manipulate Hands

jv3XUW2upC7aFRtR.description: A crew member pulls a lever to open the apparatus's eyes, which shine bright light within 20 feet and dim light for the next 20 feet. A crew member can take this action again to close the eyes.
jv3XUW2upC7aFRtR.name: Open Eyes

mTjyYbkFbVeKoGO8.description: The apparatus of the octopus can protect its crew and passengers from water pressure to a maximum depth of 5,000 feet and contains enough air for 12 hours for a pilot alone or 6 hours for a pilot and passenger or crew member.
mTjyYbkFbVeKoGO8.name: Submersible

uoev6dRtG1YFWPrn.description: A crew member pulls a lever to open two portholes, allowing the crew to see outside the apparatus and other creatures to see into it. A crew member can take this action again to close the portholes.
uoev6dRtG1YFWPrn.name: Open Portholes

eMf9xcynjFjF5ma8.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 20, standby
eMf9xcynjFjF5ma8.name: Wind-Up

oWlyE6XYOLX2gBB6.description: This vehicle has one rear weapon mount that can be equipped with a ranged weapon. At purchase, this weapon mount is empty. Installing or uninstalling a weapon into this mount requires 10 minutes, a successful @Check[type:crafting|dc:20|name:Attach weapon], as well as an appropriate weapon to install.
oWlyE6XYOLX2gBB6.name: Weapon Mount

L0S2jaWemV8ndKIE.description: Each of the two sidecars can hold 1 passenger or 10 Bulk. The automated cycle's Speed is reduced by 5 feet for each sidecar that contains a passenger or cargo.
L0S2jaWemV8ndKIE.name: Sidecars

lctMsuE0KxKUZgnH.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 14, standby
lctMsuE0KxKUZgnH.name: Wind-Up

7LOtkjkF6S8p6CRA.description: Crew and passengers can breathe while the vehicle is underwater to a depth of 500 feet or less.
7LOtkjkF6S8p6CRA.name: Tether Buoy

Qx3tJuimyRKT7l2W.description: The bathysphere is raised and lowered from a cable at the surface and can move only vertically.
Qx3tJuimyRKT7l2W.name: Cable

upS8Tctv0gf8rQOC.description: The pilot releases the bathysphere's ballast. The bathysphere moves 3 times its Speed toward the surface at the end of the pilot's turn.
upS8Tctv0gf8rQOC.name: Ballast Release

L5LOLKdKxPBT5LCB.description: The cauldron provides its pilot with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.I9lfZUiCwMiGogVi]{Standard Cover}, although this cover doesn't typically provide any bonus to Stealth checks, as a flying cauldron is both visible and suspicious.
L5LOLKdKxPBT5LCB.name: Iron Rim

jUfFzSzu0PIwCSgB.description: Rocks and stones aren't difficult terrain to a cliff crawler, and it can traverse most vertical rock and stone surfaces at up to half its Speed.
jUfFzSzu0PIwCSgB.name: Mountain Traverser

TPj4AFDezXubgaJm.description: While most burrow Speeds only allow a creature or vehicle to move through loose dirt or earth, this vehicle is equipped with an adamantine drill and can burrow through bedrock and stone at a rate of 5 feet per minute.
TPj4AFDezXubgaJm.name: Adamantine Drill

hCwx6Q30DbNVZa88.description: Because it is sluggish, this vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
hCwx6Q30DbNVZa88.name: Sluggish

kQbyDtF75cOAr2Lc.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 26, standby
kQbyDtF75cOAr2Lc.name: Wind-Up

scXXuno9YNm1GWXK.description: This vehicle's seats are mounted on a weighted platform that pivots as the vehicle moves, automatically adjusting position with gravity. Seated creatures remain upright no matter the position or angle of the vehicle.
scXXuno9YNm1GWXK.name: Pivoting Seats

TMYxeMEQ1ilLoAlJ.description:
(10-minute wind, 10-minute operation, DC 26, standby)

For a clockwork to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for the listed amount of time, usually 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. Some clockworks' abilities require them to spend some of their remaining operational time. They can't spend more than they have and shut down immediately once they have 0 time remaining. If it's unclear when a clockwork was last wound, most clockwork keepers wind all their clockworks at a set time, typically 8 a.m.

A clockwork that lists standby in its wind-up entry can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).

A creature can attempt to Disable a Device to wind a clockwork down (with a DC listed in the wind-up entry). For each success, the clockwork loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the clockwork is in standby mode.
TMYxeMEQ1ilLoAlJ.name: Wind Up

0CcYSQlAiZcoMkF0.description: Two crew members each perform a 3-action activity on their turn to skewer nearby enemies with the clockwork castle's legs. All creatures under or adjacent to the vehicle at the end of the second character's turn take @Damage[7d8[piercing]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true|name:Avoid leg]).
0CcYSQlAiZcoMkF0.name: Skewering Step

3WQ9vWhVa2yyJCcV.description: This vehicle contains a bridge, engineering room, private sleeping quarters for up to 13 creatures, and four additional rooms (typically a dining room, kitchen, lavatory, and meeting room).
3WQ9vWhVa2yyJCcV.name: Luxurious Accommodations

MBdI0c7xv3ufaJM8.description: This vehicle's interior temperature is magically maintained. Creatures inside this vehicle are protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat.
MBdI0c7xv3ufaJM8.name: Environmental Protections

VqS08x8SzApqcmVy.description: This vehicle has four rooftop weapon mounts; one mount on each corner of the vehicle. At purchase, these weapon mounts are initially empty. Installing or uninstalling a weapon into a weapon mount requires 10 minutes, a successful @Check[type:crafting|dc:35|name:Attach a weapon], and an appropriate weapon. Three of these weapon mounts can be equipped with ranged weapons, and the fourth can be equipped with a ranged siege weapon of size Large or smaller.
VqS08x8SzApqcmVy.name: Weapon Mounts

dabct2Mb2XcbWKwb.description: This vehicle is mounted on ten spider-like legs that enable it to turn swiftly, turn in place, and even move backward. Each 90-degree turn made in less than a vehicle length costs 5 extra feet of movement; so, for example, it costs 10 feet of movement for the vehicle to turn around and begin moving backward. This vehicle loses these benefits when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken}.
dabct2Mb2XcbWKwb.name: Maneuverable

tS9MnEsewMslgzhi.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 35, standby
tS9MnEsewMslgzhi.name: Wind-Up

gafl9oZCmfSGtfxj.description: This vehicle hops across the terrain as it moves across the ground. The clockwork hopper ignores difficult terrain from earth, rock, rubble, slopes, and underbrush, and greater difficult terrain caused by those features is normal difficult terrain to the clockwork hopper.
gafl9oZCmfSGtfxj.name: Hopper

uP38cyn9BsX8ni0O.description: The pilot engages a spring-driven mechanism that rockets the clockwork hopper into the air, in a grand leap. The vehicle jumps in a straight line in the direction of its current heading without touching the ground, landing in a space of solid ground up to 70 feet forward and up to 30 feet up. Creatures adjacent to the spaces a hopper lands in take @Damage[4d10[bludgeoning]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22|basic:true|name:Avoid clockwork hopper], and are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} on a critical failure. The clockwork hopper can't use Massive Jump again for 1 minute. Massive Jump stops working if the clockwork hopper is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken}.
uP38cyn9BsX8ni0O.name: Massive Jump

zEf7XS6RlEjM0VSO.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 22, standby
zEf7XS6RlEjM0VSO.name: Wind-Up

0pWllu1H0c2ZTJbM.description: This vehicle is designed to transport heavy cargo over long distances. It can hold 400 Bulk of cargo.
0pWllu1H0c2ZTJbM.name: Hauler

38Zgv0sAfLXH2dfB.description: 1 hour of wind-up, 8 hours of operational time, DC 18, standby
38Zgv0sAfLXH2dfB.name: Wind-Up

7OqKezdHChnhLvmc.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
7OqKezdHChnhLvmc.name: Sluggish

79YskaB7D1bAmIDD.description: The pilot performs a three-action activity on their turn to vent alchemical fire out the sides of this vehicle. This requires three flasks of minor alchemist's fire, which the pilot loads into the vent as part of the activity. The pilot must then attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:5]. On a success, creatures adjacent to this vehicle take @Damage[1d8[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:15|basic:true|name:Avoid Flames]). On a failure, it backfires, dealing @Damage[1d8[fire]] damage to the pilot and any passengers, with no save.
79YskaB7D1bAmIDD.name: Volatile Flamethrower

Gy4AuNFAGBzfjRFq.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Whenever this vehicle is being piloted, it continually emits a thin haze of smoke and chemicals. Creatures in the aura (including the pilot and passengers) take a -1 circumstance penalty to visual Perception checks.
Gy4AuNFAGBzfjRFq.name: Smog

yKd1wGx6zmlBwk0u.description: When this vehicle takes physical damage the pilot must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] (or a @Check[type:flat|dc:20] when it takes a critical hit). On a failure, the armored hull fractures and the vehicle loses its Hardness and takes a -4 circumstance penalty to AC.
yKd1wGx6zmlBwk0u.name: Fall Apart

RJf32Bczb9zQaFqs.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
RJf32Bczb9zQaFqs.name: Sluggish

ChjOaa11CkBJeVJ8.description: Powered by magical lightning, this vehicle sheds bright light within 20 feet, and dim light for a further 20 feet.
ChjOaa11CkBJeVJ8.name: Glow

XLttadhtgYoOq6f1.description: The pilot overcharges the vehicle, causing it to create a brilliant flash of light. All creatures in the bright light from its glow aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19|name:Avoid flash] or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 minute. The firefly's light dims for 10 minutes, reducing its glow to 10 feet of dim light, during which time it can't use flash. Flash stops working if the firefly is broken.
XLttadhtgYoOq6f1.name: Flash

fG2IE4D8GEe8e98D.description: This vehicle is held aloft by rapidly spinning propellers that enable it to hover 1 foot in the air. It is incapable of flying any higher, and when the pilot stops the magic or the vehicle breaks, it descends 1 foot to the ground.
fG2IE4D8GEe8e98D.name: Hover

V0Iw3ZOvbTqoxlvz.description: The firework pgo moves exclusively via @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaping}. For each action spent to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{Drive}, the pogo Leaps 20 feet horizontally or 10 feet vertically.
V0Iw3ZOvbTqoxlvz.name: Jump Jet

W01aasqmTJL5TpkW.description: When the pilot uses a 3-action activity to recklessly @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.uS3qDAgOkZ7b8ERL]{Drive} the firework pogo, it emits a burst of flames on launch that deals @Damage[3d6[fire]] damage to the pilot, the pogo itself, and each creature in a 10‑foot radius (@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true] save).
W01aasqmTJL5TpkW.name: Unstable Launch

tFb8nV3bxHVLeU8Z.description: With a full complement of skilled rowers, a rowed galley can turn swiftly, turn in place, and even row backwards. Each 90-degree turn made in less than a vehicle length costs 5 extra feet of movement. It can row backwards no faster than half its speed, and it can't turn while rowing backwards.
tFb8nV3bxHVLeU8Z.name: Maneuverable

Ix4GHIqSUqHawiG8.description: The only way to launch a glider is to jump off a steep incline with favorable wind conditions. The glider is uncontrolled and falls 60 feet each round until the pilot successfully Takes Control. If the glider hits the ground before the pilot successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.yh9O9BQjwWrAIiuf]{Takes Control}, the pilot and the glider each take falling damage.
Ix4GHIqSUqHawiG8.name: Starting Drop

xB0A9RW1Zi6TC7g0.description: The only way to launch a Hillcross glider is to jump off a steep incline with favorable wind conditions. The glider is uncontrolled and falls 60 feet each round until the pilot successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.yh9O9BQjwWrAIiuf]{Takes Control}. If the glider hits the ground before the pilot Takes Control, the pilot and the glider both take falling damage.
xB0A9RW1Zi6TC7g0.name: Starting Drop

9UcPAPPrzEhaoWgY.description: The rowboat can be carried overland by 2 Medium creatures or 1 Large creature. Those creatures are encumbered when doing so.
9UcPAPPrzEhaoWgY.name: Portaged

2UISHdYECuDVkedh.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
2UISHdYECuDVkedh.name: Sluggish

rvLRBCsFQMdUKtar.description: The sand barge can travel over sand, water, and quicksand equally well, but it can't traverse solid ground.
rvLRBCsFQMdUKtar.name: Sand Skimmer

PqsmKTcXOM0aNYo8.description: A sand diver can only @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through sand, using the heat and flame from its alchemical core to slowly dig its way through. The alchemical fumes left behind become trapped belowground as it Burrows, temporarily catalyzing fragments of sand into a glass-like byproduct. Creatures that Burrow through a space this vehicle has Burrowed through within the last 24 hours take @Damage[1d12[piercing]] damage from the shards (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:17|basic:true|name:Avoid shards]). A creature that continues Burrowing through a stretch of the same space the sand diver recently Burrowed through must continue to attempt this save the first time each round that it Burrows through the shards.
PqsmKTcXOM0aNYo8.name: Shard Trail

rDwfQJPnK5YyRx7v.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
rDwfQJPnK5YyRx7v.name: Sluggish

V0HecEvj92RlltT5.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
V0HecEvj92RlltT5.name: Sluggish

O5JvDSJWNWG2VtpR.description:
Frequency once per minute

Effect Two crew members each perform a 2-action activity on their turn to emit an electrical pulse, dealing @Damage[6d6[electricity]]{6d6 electricity damage} to all creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} of the shark diver. Crew and passengers of the shark diver are unaffected. Affected creatures must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true] save.
O5JvDSJWNWG2VtpR.name: Electrify

V86H5yeH71jmelzY.description: The shark diver can travel beneath the surface of the water, carrying an air reservoir suitable to sustain 11 Medium creatures for up to 24 hours. The shark diver can safely reach depths of up to 300 feet. If broken, the shark diver loses air from its reservoir, reducing the stored air by 10 minutes per round. A broken shark diver has its maximum depth reduced by half.
V86H5yeH71jmelzY.name: Submersible

Buxx8NC3JQzeLsjs.description: This vehicle must move twice its length for each 90-degree turn it makes.
Buxx8NC3JQzeLsjs.name: Sluggish

XvCWEJlIIDSfz2EA.description: Ice and snow are not difficult terrain to a sleigh, but all other terrains are difficult terrain for it.
XvCWEJlIIDSfz2EA.name: Ice Traverser

cFwKXyV5W3o1v3KK.description: This vehicle secretes an alchemical adhesive that allows it to stick to and climb up solid surfaces. Spaces the snail coach moves through become difficult terrain for 1 round. Any creature that ends their turn on the adhesive must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:23|name:Avoid adhesive] or take a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} DC 23).
cFwKXyV5W3o1v3KK.name: Adhesive Secretions

R2SaS8szVUWwiHQr.description: This lightweight vehicle has no additional storage space for cargo.
R2SaS8szVUWwiHQr.name: Streamlined

iU2xj2sIMM3UdezU.description: The pilot releases built up pressure in the speedster's alchemical steam engine in order to temporarily increase its speed. For [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}, the speedster's Speed becomes 80 feet and all move actions the pilot takes gain the reckless trait. When the pilot takes an action that already would have the reckless trait, the pilot uses the degree of success one worse than the one they rolled on the piloting check. The speedster can't use Speed Boost again for 1 hour, as the pressure requires time to rebuild.
iU2xj2sIMM3UdezU.name: Speed Boost

kr1leAaQlGXDTwn6.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 2 hours of operational time, DC 28, standby
kr1leAaQlGXDTwn6.name: Wind-Up

kbVUEpQsOKNyw0BS.description: Whenever the steam cart takes collision damage, its engine expels a dense cloud of steam in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5]. The steam cart and all creatures in the steam become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed}, and creatures outside the steam become concealed to creatures within it. The steam dissipates in 1 round.
kbVUEpQsOKNyw0BS.name: Steam Cloud

Rb4MyOLlodPUZdJX.description: Two crew members each perform a 3-action activity on their turn to produce a gout of flames that erupts at the end of the second character's turn from any corner of any space the steam giant occupies. The flames deal @Damage[6d8[fire]] damage to each creature in a 30-foot cone (@Check[type:reflex|dc:32|basic:true] save). The flame jet stops working if the steam giant is broken.
Rb4MyOLlodPUZdJX.name: Flame Jet

b3OQJLYv4hEX7yhn.description: The strider can bridge a gap as wide as 30 feet by Striding over it.
b3OQJLYv4hEX7yhn.name: Long Reach

QUHIpCfam8YMHy6U.description:
Trigger The titanic stomper is targeted by, or in the area of, an effect that deals electricity damage

Effect The pilot uses their reaction to activate the Stasian coils, which funnels the electricity into the titanic stomper's electrical engine. The next time Bolt Blast is used within the next minute, the damage it deals increases to @Damage[7d12[electricity]] damage.
QUHIpCfam8YMHy6U.name: Electrical Absorption

lTX8qPMdwaThuCnc.description: The ground shakes with every step a titanic stomper takes. Whenever this vehicle moves, creatures on the ground within 20 feet of its movement path must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:32|name:Stay standing]. On a failure, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} for 1 round, and on a critical failure, they're knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
lTX8qPMdwaThuCnc.name: Quaking Step

vDMm6mf0S2i9JMzd.description: Two crew members each perform a three-action activity on their turn to fire a line of lightning at the end of the second character's turn. This line of lightning erupts from the front of the titanic stomper at an angle of the crew members' choice and deals @Damage[5d12[electricity]] damage to each creature in a 120-foot line (@Check[type:reflex|dc:34|basic:true|name:Avoid the blast]). The Bolt Blast stops working if the titanic stomper is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken}.
vDMm6mf0S2i9JMzd.name: Bolt Blast

PcXltLxBnG3FD8dH.description: The velocipede can be pulled along the ground on its wheel by a Medium creature. The creature is encumbered when doing so.
PcXltLxBnG3FD8dH.name: Portable

QwXzg5zGAZg4h78t.description: Driving the velocipede over difficult terrain increases the DC by an additional 2 and gains the reckless trait.
QwXzg5zGAZg4h78t.name: Fragile

UQr6y2RUCvhlcvZ3.description: While the swirling rings of the vehicle don't fully cover the pilot, they offer incredible protection, magically maintaining the temperature within and ablating physical attacks. The pilot is protected from severe cold, severe heat, extreme cold, and extreme heat. The pilot also gains resistance 10 to all physical damage (except adamantine).
UQr6y2RUCvhlcvZ3.name: Protective Barrier

izZwMB8zgdsWje9o.description: The pilot harnesses power from the magical gemstones hidden among this vehicle's extravagant embellishments to grant the vehicle additional defenses. This vehicle gains resistance 20 to one of the following energy damage types: acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, or sonic. This immunity lasts until Prismatic Defense is next activated.
izZwMB8zgdsWje9o.name: Prismatic Defense

kt9xSEJnhJNdCBEy.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:40]{40 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

The gold, gems, and other embellishments that adorn this flying sphere emit a sparkling resplendence capable of enthralling creatures. Each creature that begins its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:36|traits:magic]; on a failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for as long as it remains within the aura. A creature that succeeds is temporarily immune for 1 hour. Each time Prismatic Defense is activated, the area of Captivating Wealth is reduced by 10 feet for 1 hour, to a minimum of 0 feet.
kt9xSEJnhJNdCBEy.name: Captivating Wealth

zni42kvDwzT6lzuW.description: 10 minutes of wind-up, 1 hour of operational time, DC 37, standby
zni42kvDwzT6lzuW.name: Wind-Up
